title: Cheetah (1994 film)
data: Cheetah is a 1994 Indian Hindi-language action film directed by Harmesh Malhotra[2] starring Mithun Chakraborty, Ashwini Bhave, Shikha Swaroop, Prem Chopra and Raza Murad.[3] The film's theme is based on the 1990 film Hard to Kill and was later remade as Ram Shastra.[4] This article about a Hindi film of the 1990s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
